GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.10.159
GSD.description:
mm/gup: fix gup_pud_range() for dax

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.159 by commit f1cf856123ceb766c49967ec79b841030fa1741f, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 414fd080d125408cb15d04ff4907e1dd8145c8c7. For more details please see the references link.
